definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: These ideals serve as the cornerstone for all Marriott associates fulfilling the "Spirit to Serve."
sentences.chinese: 这些理念成为马里奥特员工实现“服务精神”的基础。

sentences.english: The Miami Heat have Dwyane Wade and Mario Chalmers.
sentences.chinese: 迈阿密热火韦德和马里奥查默斯。

sentences.english: Following a tearful farewell from Princess Peach, the credits consist of Mario and Luigi leaving the Mushroom Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 泪别碧琪公主后，马里奥兄弟离开了蘑菇王国。

sentences.english: Mario could crouch down, tuck his limbs into his shell and slide across the screen.
sentences.chinese: 马里奥从此可以匍匐着把四肢收进壳里，滑行前进。

sentences.english: One night, Mario was engrossed in his Famicom game.
sentences.chinese: 一天夜里，马里奥正在专心致志的打游戏。

sentences.english: He began to investigate other groups who might have been in the area.
sentences.chinese: 马里奥特着手调查可能出现在案发地的其他人群。

sentences.english: Just address it to Jose or Mario. They just use the same names over and over again anyway.
sentences.chinese: 那就写何塞或马里奥好了，反正好多人都叫这个名字。

sentences.english: Mario Gomez had two fingers sliced off by falling rocks.
sentences.chinese: 马里奥戈麦斯已经被落石砍掉了两个手指。

sentences.english: Mario Theissen believes that the inaugural Singapore GP will be very special. , Pq, O' a2
sentences.chinese: 马里奥泰森认为首次新加坡大奖赛将会非常得特殊。

sentences.english: It’s a neat gadget to add to Mario’s arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 这是马里奥武器库新增的一款小巧工具。

sentences.english: Sakura says she loves playing as Peach in games like Super Smash Bros.
sentences.chinese: 樱说她爱装扮成游戏《超级马里奥兄弟》中的碧琪。

sentences.english: Landry said she discovered "really strong evidence" of the Saved by the Bell star's infidelity.
sentences.chinese: 兰德说她发现马里奥对她不忠，而且证据确凿。

sentences.english: Mario can ride Yoshi as he's always done.
I hope Mario can play for the rest of the season pretty much.
sentences.chinese: 我希望马里奥在剩下的赛季能够有出色的发挥。

sentences.english: Mario then discovers a small necklace that Peach left on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 之后，马里奥发现了碧琪公主掉落的小项链。

sentences.english: Why does Marriott think Feigenbaum is Jack the Ripper?
sentences.chinese: 为什么马里奥特会认为费恩鲍姆就是开膛手杰克呢？

definition: Zelda (in Legend of Zelda video game)
Alan, Allen, Allan, Alain etc (name)/A-lan (Chinese female name)
